name: Blindly Loving
description:
Blindly loving is a audio base dating simulator made with Unity + Fmod.

This game is about understanding and forming bounds with other characters through audio, featuring 5 types of characters with 6 different profiles with 4 variations, for a total of 120 possible character combinations.

The ones you will create bounds appear all around you.
Isolating yourself will make the ones around you fade away and move on.
The ones you make a special bound with will stay with you forever.
Not everyone is your type, no matter how much you try to interact with them.

Game by Guilherme Silva and Giorgio Vezzini
